headline: Stipulated agreement reached to help keep electricity affordable and meet future energy demand in Georgia
summary: Good news for Georgia families and businesses: Georgia Power has reached an agreement with the Public Interest Advocacy (PIA) Staff of the Georgia Public Service Commission (PSC) that, if approved, will help lower energy costs—all while meeting growing electricity demand across the state. The company announced today it has reached the stipulated agreement with the PIA Staff, which is designed to allow the company to meet the projected rapidly increasing demand for electricity in the state while

headline: Southern (SO) — Assessing Valuation After a Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: Southern (SO) has slipped about 7% in the past 3 months, even though its underlying business keeps growing. That disconnect is what has investors asking whether the recent pullback is overdone. See our latest analysis for Southern. At around $85.49 per share, Southern’s 30 day share price pullback sits against a still positive year to date share price return. A robust five year total shareholder return suggests long term momentum is intact rather than broken. If Southern’s mix of steady...
